description:
In New Mexico, oil companies agreed to work with regulators to find a solution to the state’s more than 70,000 unplugged wells. After months of negotiations, the industry turned against the bill it helped shape.

The post How America’s ‘Most Powerful Lobby’ Is Stifling Efforts to Reform Oil Well Cleanup appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How America’s ‘Most Powerful Lobby’ Is Stifling Efforts to Reform Oil Well Cleanup
